sources.src/js/views/recipeView.js:
import icons from '../../img/icons.svg'; import Fraction from 'fractions'; import View from './view'; class RecipeView extends View{ _parentElement = document.querySelector('.recipe'); _errorMessage = 'We could not find that recipe. Please try another one!'; _message = ''; addHandlerRender(handler) { ['hashchange', 'load'] .forEach(ev => window.addEventListener(ev, handler)); } _generateMarkup() { return `
${this._data.cookingTime} minutes
${this._data.servings} servings

Recipe ingredients

    ${this._data.ingredients.map(ing => { return `
  • ${new Fraction(ing.quantity).toString() }
    ${ing.unit} ${ing.description}
    • ` }).join('')}

How to cook it

This recipe was carefully designed and tested by ${this._data.publisher}. Please check out directions at their website.

Directions
`; } } export default new RecipeView();
